text: Dr Meehan is thorough, so knowledgeable and very caring and attentive.  I highly recommend him - a wonderful primary care physician.  I feel fortunate to have him.

name: Initials hidden
text: I've been seeing Dr. Meehan for over 10 years and am always impressed with his attention to my medical issues and well-being as well as the professionalism and friendliness of the staff.

name: Initials hidden
text: I like Meehan but please hire people who can draw blood properly. Twice now in the past year when I've gotten my blood drawn the nurse or nurse's aid misses my vein and has caused painful bruising. This has happened with two different staff employees.

name: Siobhan R., verified patient
text: Dr. Meehan is incredibly thorough, concerned, and effective. He is eager to get to the bottom of an open question, and quick to use his network to connect you with trusted specialists. And I adore the staff in his office, all of whom are warm, knowledgeable, and incredibly helpful.

name: Eric S., verified patient
text: He was great, warm and inviting!

name: Initials hidden
text: Dr. Meehan is very caring and professional, but his wait times are consistently longer than any doctor I've seen over the past 30 years.  I had to wait more than 75 minutes on my most recent appointment.  Very frustrating!

name: Eric H., verified patient
text: I have been a patient of Dr Meehan for many years and have always appreciated his approach and treatment. He is a great listener and takes time to understand your ailments. He also knows your medical history and your current situation to deliver the best treatment

name: Initials hidden
text: It’s like his wait times get longer each time I go. 1+ hour waits are a bit ridiculous.

text: Love going to Dr. Meehan’s office. Entire staff is friendly and courteous. They do all tests in house so no need to go to other location for blood samples etc. Highly recommend.

text: Dr. Meehan is thorough, attentive, relatable, and more than worth the long wait times. He also saved my life, so I’m pretty enthusiastic about this person.

I strongly recommend

name: Keith A., verified patient
text: Dr. Wisnicki is great and his colleagues are also great.  The wait continues to be unacceptable.  If there becomes one reason why I would stop seeing Dr. Wisnicki is because, I cannot block out sufficient time given the wait that always takes place.

name: Initials hidden
text: Long wait, but worth it.

name: Sofia T., verified patient
text: HE IS VERY PROFESSIONAL BUT WARM AT THE SAME TIME.

name: Nellya L., verified patient
text: Seems like a good doctor.

name: Initials hidden
text:
Dr. Wisnicki is a straight-forward, funny doctor, and is thorough with his diagnosis and treatment. 

My biggest complaint is the wait time. I've visited him three times, and all three times, the wait has been more than one hour.

name: James S., verified patient
text: His assistant, Mac, was a consumate professional.  He really knows his stuff.

name: John D., verified patient
text: Excellent in all respects.

name: Matt S., verified patient
text: Amazing and super friendly

name: Ashley C., verified patient
text: Excellent experience all around!

name: Kayla H., verified patient
text:
She made conversation and didn’t make me feel “just like another patient”. It was very educational as well and she listened to my concerns. I’d definitely recommend this doctor to anyone looking! :) 

The receptionist was lovely as well!

name: Hasan R., verified patient
text: Good experience

name: Liz B., verified patient
text: Dr. Cercone was wonderful! This was my first eye exam ever and she made me feel very comfortable and explained everything she was doing and testing before she did it. Office was super clean and the staff was very friendly.

name: Initials hidden
text: I loved Dr. Cercone! I highly recommend her.  She knew the exact course of treatment to take and listened to every symptom I told her very closely. The whole staff was great, but the wait time was a little high. Perhaps it’s because I was there on a Saturday.

name: Initials hidden
text: I would not recommend this doctor or this practice.

name: Initials hidden
text: The visit was fine, but she was visiting multiple other patients at the same time and overall the cleanliness was not what I would expect from a DR  office.

name: Janet J., verified patient
text: I had an Excellent experience and definitely would recommend Dr. CERECONE she's very deligent. She answered all my questions and made me feel at easy and we'll taken care of.

name: Lauren S., verified patient
text: Dr Cercone was completely flexible with me when an incident rendered the transit system bogged down by multiple hour delays. When I did get to the office, she was completely professional, friendly, and was happy to talk through every question I had.

name: Gary D., verified patient
text: Personable, thorough and knows her stuff

name: Deborah B., verified patient
text:
Professional, informed,sympathetic, personable. She was terrific!
Deborah Bernstein, MD

name: Erika S., verified patient
text: She was friendly, caring, and thorough.

name: Initials hidden
text: It was great! Dr. Cercone was super chill, easy to talk to and totally took care of my issues! Would recommend to a friend!

name: Eric M., verified patient
text: Awesome! Very knowledgeable, professional, and pleased bed-side manner.

name: Initials hidden
text: Lovely doctor, highly recommend.

name: Initials hidden
text: Thorough examination, friendly doctor, and personable staff!

name: Eric M., verified patient
text:
Helpful. Competant. Great bedside manner.
Great at explaining what's going on with your eye, and what to do to get better.

name: Rebecca C., verified patient
text: Dr. Cercone was kind, competent, and helpful. Look forward to my next visit!

name: Kimberly F., verified patient
text: She was great, easy to speak and quick. I was super nervous and she put me at ease.

name: Kylene C., verified patient
text: The optometrist herself was lovely and provided excellent bedside manner and excellent care during the examination. However, the wait time was long. I was scheduled for 11:00 am and wasn't seen until near noon.

name: Nicole S., verified patient
text: It was great, i got seen right away, she explained every part of the process of getting my new perscription. She made me very comfortable, and my new perscription is perfect!

name: Nereida V., verified patient
text: Great experience! Everyone was very helpful and pleasant!

name: Vightligum V., verified patient
text: Great doctor, great office, great staff. I was in and out in no time despite being late with a prescription for glasses in hand which I was able to get some nifty glasses in their optical shop. So convenient !

name: Initials hidden
text: Good optician. A. It slow being seen which was frustrating as tge 1st appt if the day. Also wasnt expecting to lose sight for several hours after one of the eye test drops.

name: Shola O., verified patient
text: Friendly Staff & Great Dr.

name: Matthew V., verified patient
text: Great experience! Very helpful from the front desk to the doctor it was a great visit. Highly recommended!

name: Ruth L., verified patient
text: Long wait, rushed exam.... and no answer to my post-appointment question... would not recommend this office

name: Initials hidden
text: Fantastic. Will definitely be back. Made me feel comfortable and relaxed the whole time.

name: Stephanie K., verified patient
text: Dr. Mancuso and the team were very professional and knowledgable. I had to wait an hour to be seen but the office is nice and so are the receptionists, which helps. I would highly recommend this office.

name: Colin J., verified patient
text: All around great experience, highly recommend

name: Daron J., verified patient
text: Great office of professionals! Highly recommend!

text: Long wait time, but the Doctor was gracious about it.

name: Initials hidden
text: Everyone quite professional.  I will go back.

name: Lauren L., verified patient
text: She was professional but very kind. I left the office feeling reassured and cared for.

name: Amanda D., verified patient
text: Everyone was great! I actually came in super early for my appointment and they took me right away. She was very sweet, and I would definitely visit again.

text: Excellent clinic. Professional Doctor and staff.
